item.description:
The theme of this meet up is From Peace Inside to Peace in the World.
Everything matters and everything is connected. Come and experience peace at a deeper level and learn how you can affect peace in the world with your meditation practice. There will be practical information as well as hands on. We will meet for 1hour from 7 to 8pm
Let's be peace in our hearts!
item.how_to_find_us: just come though the front door. If looked, ring the bell
item.name: From Peace inside to Peace in the World
